about_the_game:
Local + Online Co-Op


Take on the nazis with up to 4 players in PVE co-op.

Loot and Survive


Manage many resources to stay alive behind enemy lines: Food, Water, Health, Energy, Body Temperature, and Mental Strength.

Sabotage


Hit the enemy where it hurts! Sabotage the enemy's lifelines; vehicles, factories, food production, anything you can!

Assassinate


The less Nazis the better, take down high ranking officers but make sure you have a clear exit route. Use sniper rifles, explosives, or even your bare hands.

Extrakt


Get out of the mission zone alive. If you die during your run, you'll lose all your loot! Choose to extract with your loot or push on for greater challenges and rewards.

content_descriptors.notes: The main goal is to kill nazis and to survive in 1943 behind enemy lines.

Take on the nazis with up to 4 players in PVE co-op.

The less Nazis the better, take down high ranking officers but make sure you have a clear exit route. Use sniper rifles, explosives, or even your bare hands.

Get out of the mission zone alive. If you die during your run, you'll lose all your loot! Choose to extract with your loot or push on for greater challenges and rewards.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: quad core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: Modern Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

name: Extraktion 1943

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Quad core Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Extraktion 1943 is a roguelite extraction shooter set in Nazi Germany. Survive as a stranded Allied soldier behind enemy lines. Take on the Nazis solo or online with friends, sabotage enemy production, assassinate high-ranking officers, and build your hideout and resistance network. DEATH TO HITLER!
